      • queryToMap

        public Map<String,String> queryToMap()
        get the query parameters of the recent exchange as map of fields as keys and values e.g. something like ...?user=Pris&age=2 would turn into a map "user" : "Pris", "age" : "2"
        Returns:
        map containing all queryparameters
